original_text: Woe unto them that draw iniquity with cords of vanity, and sin as it were with a cart rope:
korean_text: 거짓으로 끈을 삼아 죄악을 끌며 수레 줄로 함 같이 죄악을 끄는 자는 화 있을진저

sentences.original_text: Woe unto them that draw iniquity with cords of vanity
sentences.korean_translation: 헛된 줄로 죄악을 끄는 자들에게 화 있을진저

sentences.original_text: and sin as it were with a cart rope
sentences.korean_translation: 수레 끈으로 죄를 끄는 것 같도다
